mapper.sql: t.id, t.user_id, t.email_type, t.email_status, t.send_time, t.send_code, t.send_content
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_send_info (user_id, email_type, email_status, send_time, send_code, send_content) VALUES (#{userId}, #{emailType}, #{emailStatus}, SYSDATE(), #{sendCode}, #{sendContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT FROM email_send_info AS t WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} and t.email_type = #{emailType} and SYSDATE() < DATE_ADD(t.send_time,INTERVAL 3 DAY) ORDER BY t.send_time desc LIMIT 0, 1
